conbody.p: Contracting officers shall comply with the economic purchase quantity planning requirements for supplies in subpartÂ 7.2. See 7.203 for instructions regarding use of the provision at 52.207-4, Economic Purchase Quantity-Supplies, and 7.204 for guidance on handling responses to that provision.
